definition: to talk idly about important matters (idiom)/to set the world to rights/to pass judgment on everything
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Who can show the country, take it leisurely and unoppressively?
sentences.chinese: 誰又能指點江山，從容不迫？

sentences.english: Are we all so unintelligent that we need an elitist to comment on national affairs?
sentences.chinese: 我們都是些低能兒，需要精英來指點江山？

sentences.english: Exactly schoolmate youth, in full flower, the direction landscape, encourages the writing.
sentences.chinese: 恰同學少年，風華正茂，指點江山，激揚文字。

sentences.english: There were only the passersby on the side watching the excitement and making comments.
sentences.chinese: 只有一幫閒人幫旁邊看熱鬧指點江山。

sentences.english: We can proudly" Jiangshan guidance, stimulate raise character".
sentences.chinese: 我們可以自得地“指點江山，激揚文字”。

definition: lit. scattered ashes and dispersed smoke (idiom)/fig. to be annihilated/to vanish in a puff of smoke
object of ridicule/laughingstock/to laugh over sth/to make light chat
to amuse oneself/to play with/to tease
to call the wind and summon the rain (idiom); to exercise magical powers/fig. to stir up troubles
lit. to build a cart behind closed doors/to be overly subjective and disregard the outside world (idiom)
lit. cool breeze and bright moon (idiom)/fig. peaceful and clear night/(allusively) living a solitary and quiet life
variant of 閒談|闲谈[xian2 tan2]
